data.name: Dead of Winter
data.detailed_description:
Build, gather and defend against relentless hordes of undead as you lead your villagers to safety and battle for survival in a world plunged into a seemingly endless winter

Construct Buildings

Construct buildings to give your villagers somewhere safe to live and work

Gather Resources

Task your villagers on work buildings to gather nearby resources


Train Defenders

Train your villagers and equip them with weapons to defend your settlement

Worship Gods

Build shrines to worship ancient gods to receive their powerful blessings
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: Build, gather and defend against relentless hordes of undead as you lead your villagers to safety and battle for survival in a world plunged into a seemingly endless winter

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 Processor or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 530 / ATI Radeon HD 6570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 Processor or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 1080 / ATI Radeon HD 8970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
